trans-unit.source: Provides the configuration element whose settings enable a client application to automatically search for a discoverable workflow service and find its address at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 提供設定可讓用戶端應用程式自動搜尋可探索的工作流程服務，並在執行階段時尋找其位址的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.DiscoveryClientSettingsElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.DiscoveryClientSettingsElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"></xref> that enables a client application to automatically search for a discoverable workflow service and find its address at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"> </xref> ，可讓用戶端應用程式自動搜尋可探索的工作流程服務，並且在執行階段時尋找其位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref> that supplies a set of criteria used by a client application to search for a discovery workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"> </xref> ，它提供一組用戶端應用程式用來搜尋探索工作流程服務的準則。
